snippet: Christopher Cox, who had held the job only three months, said he was fired because of “editorial differences,” but would not elaborate.
abstract: Harper's Magazine editor Christopher Cox is fired after three months in position.
lead_paragraph: Christopher Cox, who had held the job only three months, said he was fired because of “editorial differences,” but would not elaborate.

headline.main: Harper’s Magazine Publisher Fires Christopher Cox as Editor
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Harper’s Magazine Editor Out After 3 Months
